summary: Completed comprehensive testing of subdomain management system. All 17 backend API tests passed (100%). Fixed 1 frontend bug in AdminPanel.jsx where admin block/unblock was sending wrong payload. All features working correctly.

integration_issues.issue: Admin subdomain toggle was sending { disabled_by_admin: bool } instead of { is_active: bool }
integration_issues.fix: Changed payload from { disabled_by_admin: !currentDisabled } to { is_active: currentDisabled }

passed_tests: GET /api/subdomains - returns user's subdomains with count, max_limit, can_add
GET /api/subdomains/check/{subdomain} - availability check for unique subdomain
GET /api/subdomains/check/{subdomain} - reserved subdomain rejection (admin, www, etc)
GET /api/admin/subdomains - list all subdomains with owner info
Access control - regular user denied admin endpoints (403)
Frontend: Domains page loads correctly with all UI elements
Frontend: Usage indicator shows 1/1 for FREE plan
Frontend: Plan limit warning displayed when limit reached
Frontend: Subdomain toggle ON/OFF works with toast notifications
Frontend: Admin Panel Domains tab shows all subdomains
Frontend: Admin block/unblock subdomain works (after fix)
seed_data_creation: None - used existing subdomain 'mymusic' created by test user
context_for_next_testing_agent: Subdomain management system fully tested and working. Test user (test@test.com) has 1 subdomain 'mymusic' and has reached FREE plan limit (1 max). Admin can block/unblock subdomains. Fixed bug in AdminPanel.jsx where admin toggle was sending wrong payload format.
